entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider incorporating SimdBase64 #107816
    10.0.0
  • Aot build bug #107807
  • USB Flash Drive DriveType reported as Fixed by DriveInfo - Linux #107803
  • JIT bit test is not recognized for pattern matching syntax #107801
    10.0.0
  • Possible deadlock on process exit if GC is in progress #107800
    10.0.0
  • System.Text.Json should support deserializing more collection types #107787
    10.0.0
  • terminate called after throwing an instance of 'PAL_SEHException' #107785
  • Unable to deserialize ArraySegment<int> with System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Deserialize #107783
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8PropertyName API #107782
    10.0.0

Closed

  • `ref readonly` parameters of a generic type may get corrupted #107710
  • Use transitive reference packages instead of explicit reference packages. #107439
  • Possible regression with [ThreadStatic] in debug builds on .NET 9 RC1 #107728
  • After creating a Worker service project, "System.text.json" 8.0.0 was referenced and identified as a vulnerable package #105120
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed '(targetReg == op1Reg) || (targetReg != op3Reg)' during 'Generate code' #106866
    9.0.0
  • can not attach to debugger, signature validation issues. #107684
    10.0.0
  • Unactionable trim warnings when using DataSet and IXmlSerializable #107704
    10.0.0
  • How to definition event with ComWrappers? #107779
  • SSLStream write delay on Android #106885
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Stress/ABI/tailcalls_do/tailcalls_do.cmd #107727
    9.0.0
  • `Enumerable.CountBy` enumerates an `IEnumerable` instead of returning it directly #107794
  • [mono] Fix swift struct lowering support for `InlineArray` #107736
    10.0.0
  • Unify/Simplify PFX Private Key lifetime on Windows #48789
    Future
  • Version 8.0.401 release broke ability to run app with WebDriverAgent from Appium on iOS #107781
  • ServiceBase should not accept SERVICE_CONTROL_STOP during SERVICE_START_PENDING #23173
  • Investigate potential Timer latency issues on macOS #11226
  • [API Proposal]: Custom [Try]GetValue<T> methods on JsonElement for efficient projection of string values to dotnet types #74028
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: LINQ terminator .WhenAll() wrapping Task.WhenAll #107706
  • [9.0] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.ConcurrentBidirectionalReadsWrites_Success is hanging #107762
    9.0.0
  • Considerable performance gap between `Enumerable.ToList<T>()` and `List(IEnumerable<T>)` constructor #107560
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize throws not expected ArgumentOutOfRangeException #107729
  • Add AsyncWaitersCount property to SemaphoreSlim #5234
  • SemaphoreSlim fairness issue #5600
  • Apps can reach the sync table limit before a GC occurs #7768
  • Proposal: Static call to the OS GetCurrentThreadId #8636
  • Miscellaneous ReaderWriterLockSlim issues #8710
  • Suggestion: NUMA aware ThreadPool #9748
  • `Task.Delay` is less accuracy than `time.Sleep` in Golang #11609
  • Performance regression: EmptyAsyncMethodInvocation benchmark #13132
  • Using a default method on an interface to implement a static virtual interface method leads to memory corruption #107754

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve TeddyHelper.RightShift helpers for AVX512 #107819
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0]: ARM64-SVE: Allow SVE ops to re-use the same registers #107818
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix perf problems found in investigation of issue #107728 #107817
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Additional Tar tests for filled in size when data is empty #107815
    test-enhancement, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [release/9.0] Doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107814
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Fix the operands of NI_AVX512F_TernaryLogic during lowering #107813
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: use explicit cast away GC when passing byref to unmanaged callees #107811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107810
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Move computation of `DebuggerAssemblyControlFlags` from `DomainAssembly` to `Assembly` #107809
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove `AppDomain` from `DebugInterface::Load/UnloadClass` #107808
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Switch a couple properties to new VMR properties #107805
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] ARM64-SVE: Fix hwintrinsics flags #107802
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Further improve ProbabilisticMap on Avx512 #107798
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [NRBF] Remove array allocation when decoding `decimal`s. #107797
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • fix OS detection for test scripts #107796
    area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] HTTP trailers #107795
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Backport NRBF fixes and Fuzzer #107788
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • ARM64: Fix lsra for AdvSimd_LoadAndInsertScalar #107786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8PropertyName API and corresponding JsonProperty tests. #107784
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Export `monovm_create_delegate` #107778
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: adjust where folded comma throws are morphed #107777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add comments to host error_codes.h #107775
    area-Host

Merged

  • Fix perf problems found in investigation of issue #107728 #107806
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107773
    documentation, area-Meta
  • JIT: random partial compilation stress mode #107561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Revert "[GC] Avoid OOM in large-allocation-only workloads (#105521)" #107712
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update WebAssembly nuget package references to RC1 SDK #107673
    area-Infrastructure
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow SVE ops to re-use the same registers #107084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Store `Assembly` instead of `DomainAssembly` in `AssemblySpecBindingCache` and `BINDER_SPACE::Assembly` #107799
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add feature switch to disable DataSet XML serialization #107713
    area-System.Data
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix hwintrinsics flags #107791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/9.0] Arm64/Sve: Remove entries of SVE APIs take 32-bit address #107780
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Propagate block flags properly in indirectCallTransformer #107790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix memory corruption bug in virtual static method dispatch #107776
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0][browser] Enable the log profiler #107747
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove `DebuggerModule::m_pAppDomain` - always the one and only #107774
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make `AppDomain::AssemblyIterator` iterate over `Assembly` instead of `DomainAssembly` #107768
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Fixed swift lowering support for inline arrays #107744
    area-VM-meta-mono, area-Interop-mono
  • Add Perf Improvements in .NET 9 to deep dive blog posts list #107793
    area-Meta
  • Arm64/Sve: Remove entries of SVE APIs take 32-bit address #107758
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0] Move UseSystemZlib into SetupOSSpecificProps #107770
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 9.0.0
  • Remove `DebuggerModule::Get/SetPrimaryModule` - always itself #107767
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix memory corruption bug in virtual static method dispatch #107763
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm: Free up upper-half register that was not ready because of its association with busy lower-half register #107714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Profiler] Update GetFunctionInfo2 to have a decent default ClassID #107753
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fixing System.Array constructor #107266
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • WebSocket Feedback Follow-up #107662
    area-System.Net
  • [PERF] Move performance testing logic into python scripts #101143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Restructure JSImport/JSExport generators to share more code and utilize more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration shared code #107769
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Remove redundant !fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree) assert #107760
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107091
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix `emitter::emitSplit` to not create zero-sized method fragment #107568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Process LinkerArg for wasm targets #107194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • [RISC-V] Fix Int32 to Unsigned overflow check #107024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix some minor errors #107179
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NRBF] Address issues discovered by Threat Model #106629
    new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107708
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Update ABI doc #107286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NRBF] Comments and bug fixes from security review #107735
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • GC test cleanup #107000
    test-enhancement, area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve the performance of `CollectionExtensions.InsertRange` by reducing 1 array copy #107683
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
